did.abstract: Papers of Tilmon Blalock, a farmer and lieutenant colonel in the 92nd Regiment of the North Carolina militia. Blalock became a captain during the Mexican War, and later served as captain in the North Carolina militia in the Civil War. The papers consist of Mexican War military reports, records of army supplies received, applications for pensions for men killed in his regiment, and Blalock's will.
